sentences.en: Madame Blavatsky wrote a pamphlet against phallicism.
sentences.cn: 布拉瓦夫人写了一本关于反对男性生殖器崇拜的册子。

sentences.en: We'll have to get this pamphlet out before next week.
sentences.cn: 我们必须在下星期前把这本小册子发出去。

sentences.en: His excellent pamphlet can be downloaded for free, here.
sentences.cn: 他那本出色的小册子，可以在这里免费下载。
